00026 #include "OgreSerializer.h"
00027 #include "OgreLogManager.h"
00028 #include "OgreDataChunk.h"
00029 #include "OgreException.h"
00030 #include "OgreVector3.h"
00031 #include "OgreQuaternion.h"
00032 
00033 
00034 namespace Ogre {
00035 
00037     const unsigned long CHUNK_OVERHEAD_SIZE = sizeof(unsigned short) + sizeof(unsigned long);
00038     const unsigned short HEADER_CHUNK_ID = 0x1000;
00039     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00040     Serializer::Serializer()
00041     {
00042         // Version number
00043         mVersion = "[Serializer_v1.00]";
00044     }
00045     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00046     Serializer::~Serializer()
00047     {
00048     }
00049     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00050     void Serializer::writeFileHeader(void)
00051     {
00052        
00053         unsigned short val = HEADER_CHUNK_ID;
00054         writeData(&val, sizeof(unsigned short), 1);
00055 
00056         writeString(mVersion);
00057 
00058     }
00059     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00060     void Serializer::writeChunkHeader(unsigned short id, unsigned long size)
00061     {
00062         writeData(&id, sizeof(unsigned short), 1);
00063         writeData(&size, sizeof(unsigned long), 1);
00064     }
00065     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00066     void Serializer::writeReals(const Real* pReal, unsigned short count)
00067     {
00068         writeData(pReal, sizeof(Real), count);
00069     }
00070     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00071     void Serializer::writeShorts(const unsigned short* pShort, unsigned short count)
00072     {
00073         writeData(pShort, sizeof(unsigned short), count);
00074     }
00075     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00076     void Serializer::writeLongs(const unsigned long* pLong, unsigned short count)
00077     {
00078         writeData(pLong, sizeof(unsigned long), count);
00079     }
00080     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00081     void Serializer::writeData(const void* buf, size_t size, size_t count)
00082     {
00083         fwrite((void* const)buf, size, count, mpfFile);
00084     }
00085     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00086     void Serializer::writeString(const String& string)
00087     {
00088         fputs(string.c_str(), mpfFile);
00089         // Write terminating newline char
00090         fputc('\n', mpfFile);
00091     }
00092     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00093     void Serializer::readFileHeader(DataChunk& chunk)
00094     {
00095         unsigned short headerID;
00096         
00097         // Read header ID
00098         chunk.read(&headerID, sizeof(headerID));
00099         if (headerID == HEADER_CHUNK_ID)
00100         {
00101             // Read version
00102             String ver = readString(chunk);
00103             if (ver != mVersion)
00104             {
00105                 Except(Exception::ERR_INTERNAL_ERROR, 
00106                     "Invalid file: version incompatible, file reports " + String(ver) +
00107                     " Serializer is version " + mVersion,
00108                     "Serializer::readFileHeader");
00109             }
00110         }
00111         else
00112         {
00113             Except(Exception::ERR_INTERNAL_ERROR, "Invalid file: no header", 
00114                 "Serializer::readFileHeader");
00115         }
00116 
00117     }
00118     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00119     unsigned short Serializer::readChunk(DataChunk& chunk)
00120     {
00121         unsigned short id;
00122         chunk.read(&id, sizeof(id));
00123         chunk.read(&mCurrentChunkLen, sizeof(mCurrentChunkLen));
00124         return id;
00125     }
00126     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00127     void Serializer::readReals(DataChunk& chunk, Real* pDest, unsigned short count)
00128     {
00129         chunk.read(pDest, sizeof(Real) * count);
00130     }
00131     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00132     void Serializer::readShorts(DataChunk& chunk, unsigned short* pDest, unsigned short count)
00133     {
00134         chunk.read(pDest, sizeof(unsigned short) * count);
00135     }
00136     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00137     void Serializer::readLongs(DataChunk& chunk, unsigned long* pDest, unsigned short count) 
00138     {
00139         chunk.read(pDest, sizeof(unsigned long) * count);
00140     }
00141     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00142     String Serializer::readString(DataChunk& chunk)
00143     {
00144         char str[255];
00145         int readcount;
00146         readcount = chunk.readUpTo(str, 255);
00147         str[readcount] = '\0';
00148         return str;
00149 
00150     }
00151     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00152     void Serializer::writeObject(const Vector3& vec)
00153     {
00154         writeReals(&vec.x, 1);
00155         writeReals(&vec.y, 1);
00156         writeReals(&vec.z, 1);
00157 
00158     }
00159     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00160     void Serializer::writeObject(const Quaternion& q)
00161     {
00162         writeReals(&q.x, 1);
00163         writeReals(&q.y, 1);
00164         writeReals(&q.z, 1);
00165         writeReals(&q.w, 1);
00166     }
00167     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00168     void Serializer::readObject(DataChunk& chunk, Vector3* pDest)
00169     {
00170         readReals(chunk, &pDest->x, 1);
00171         readReals(chunk, &pDest->y, 1);
00172         readReals(chunk, &pDest->z, 1);
00173     }
00174     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00175     void Serializer::readObject(DataChunk& chunk, Quaternion* pDest)
00176     {
00177         readReals(chunk, &pDest->x, 1);
00178         readReals(chunk, &pDest->y, 1);
00179         readReals(chunk, &pDest->z, 1);
00180         readReals(chunk, &pDest->w, 1);
00181     }
00182     //---------------------------------------------------------------------

00184 
00185 }
